A base class for Entries which can contain other entries, such as folders.

Functions
Container
public Container ()
Sort
public void Sort ()

Sorts the members of this container, and recursively sorts the members of any containers found within it.

CompareMembers
static protected int CompareMembers (
Base.Entry a,
Base.Entry b
)

The function used for sorting members.

Condense
public virtual void Condense ()

An overridable function to handle condensing unnecessary levels into this one.  By default this will not alter the menu itself, but it will call Condense() on any subcontainers in case they implement it.

A simple way to implement this function is to call CondenseContainersInMembers() first, check to see if you have only one container as a member, and then implement the logic to combine them if so.

CondenseContainersInMembers
protected void CondenseContainersInMembers ()

Goes through the members of this container and calls Condense() on each one that is also a container.

Properties
Members
public List<Base.Entry> Members { get; set }

The list of members this entry contains.  The entire list may be replaced with another one, which is useful when merging containers.

CondensedTitles
public List<string> CondensedTitles { get; set }

If another container was condensed into this one, this will be a list of their titles.  Otherwise null.
